class.name: JarTerrainPopulator
class.brief_description: Abstract class defining objects generated as decorations for the terrain (like grass or rocks).
class.description: Abstract class defining terrain decoration objects such as grass or rocks. It specifies important parameters controlling placement, scale, and alignment of decorations.

method.name: build_transform
method.description: Builds a transformation matrix for placing a decoration instance in the world, using the specified origin point, up vector, rotation angle, and uniform scale.
